testcase.name: Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: The virologist applies an agent in their inventory to another virologist, &amp#27;[90m# features/agent_applying.feature:15&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mGiven &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe virologist and the target stand on the same field&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentApplyingStepDefinitions.the_virologist_and_the_target_stand_on_the_same_field()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe virologist has an agent in their inventory&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentApplyingStepDefinitions.the_virologist_has_an_agent_in_their_inventory()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe target has immunity? &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"Yes"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentApplyingStepDefinitions.the_target_has_immunity(java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthey try to apply the agent&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentApplyingStepDefinitions.they_try_to_apply_the_agent()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe agents effect should be applied to the target? &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"No"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentApplyingStepDefinitions.the_agents_effect_should_be_applied_to_the_target(java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe agent should be removed from their inventory&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentApplyingStepDefinitions.the_agent_should_be_removed_from_their_inventory()&amp#27;[0m

testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: The virologist can only craft an agent if they have enough materials and know the recipe for it &amp#27;[90m# features/agent_crafting.feature:13&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mGiven &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe virologist has &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m8&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m nucleotide and &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m8&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m amino acid&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentCraftingStepDefinitions.the_virologist_has_nucleotide_and_amino_acid(java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe agent crafting cost is &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m4&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m nucleotide and &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m3&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m amino acid&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentCraftingStepDefinitions.the_agent_crafting_cost_is_nucleotide_and_amino_acid(java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe virologist knows the recipe&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentCraftingStepDefinitions.the_virologist_knows_the_recipe()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthey try to craft an agent&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentCraftingStepDefinitions.they_try_to_craft_an_agent()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mtheir inventory should have the agent? &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"Yes"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# test.java.AgentCraftingStepDefinitions.their_inventory_should_have_the_agent(java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m
